info.title: OpenApi specification - Elimika
info.description: OpenApi documentation for the Elimika Application

get.summary: Get a user group by UUID

put.summary: Update a user group by UUID

delete.summary: Delete a user group by UUID

get.description: Fetches a training session by its UUID.

put.description: Updates an existing training session record.

delete.description: Removes a training session record from the system.

get.description: Fetches a student by their UUID.

delete.description: Removes a student record from the system.

get.description: Fetches an instructor by their UUID.

delete.description: Removes an instructor record from the system.

get.summary: Get users for a user group

post.summary: Add users to a user group

delete.summary: Remove users from a user group

get.summary: Get roles for a user group

post.summary: Assign roles to a user group

delete.summary: Remove roles from a user group

get.description: Fetches a paginated list of training sessions.

post.description: Saves a new training session record in the system.

post.summary: Create a new role for an organisation

get.description: Fetches a paginated list of users based on optional filters. Supports pagination and sorting.

200.description: Paginated list of users matching the search criteria

get.summary: Get user profile image by file name

get.description: Fetches a paginated list of user groups based on optional filters. Supports pagination and sorting.

200.description: Paginated list of user groups matching the search criteria

get.summary: Get all user groups for an organisation

get.description: Search for training sessions based on criteria.
Fetches a paginated list of students.
Search for students based on criteria.

get.summary: Get effective roles for a user
get.description: Fetches roles for a user, considering both direct and group assignments, with precedence given to user roles.
Fetches a paginated list of roles based on optional filters. Supports pagination and sorting.

200.description: Paginated list of roles matching the search criteria

get.description: Retrieve a list of all available permissions that can be assigned to roles.

get.summary: Get all roles for a specific organisation

get.description: Fetches a paginated list of organisations based on optional filters. Supports pagination and sorting.

200.description: Paginated list of organisations matching the search criteria

get.description: Fetches a paginated list of instructors.
Search for instructors based on criteria.

organisation_uuid.description: UUID of the organisation the user belongs to

active.description: Indicates if the user is active

profile_image_url.description: URL of the user's profile image

InstructorDTO.description: Data Transfer Object for Instructor information

user_uuid.description: Reference to the associated user account

website.description: Website or portfolio URL of the instructor

bio.description: Biography or personal description of the instructor

professional_headline.description: Professional headline or title of the instructor

professional_bodies.description: Professional body affiliations of the instructor

training_experiences.description: Training experience details of the instructor

updated_by.description: User who last updated the record

created_date.description: Timestamp when the record was created

updated_date.description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

membership_no.description: Membership number assigned by the body

member_since.description: Date when the user became a member (ISO 8601 format)

user_uuid.description: UUID of the user associated with this membership

organisation_name.description: Name of the organisation where the experience was gained

job_title.description: Job title held during the training or experience

work_description.description: Description of responsibilities and tasks performed
work_description.example: Managed regional health analytics dashboard and provided training to local analysts.

start_date.description: Start date of the training/experience (ISO 8601 format)

end_date.description: End date of the training/experience (ISO 8601 format)

user_uuid.description: UUID of the user associated with this training/experience

issued_date.description: Date the certificate was issued (ISO 8601 format)

certificate_url.description: URL pointing to the certificate resource

user_uuid.description: UUID of the user who owns this certificate
